verses.verse: My son <WH1121>, if thou be surety <WH6148> <WH8804> for thy friend <WH7453>, if thou hast stricken <WH8628> <WH8804> thy hand <WH3709> with a stranger <WH2114> <WH8801>,
Thou art snared <WH3369> <WH8738> with the words <WH561> of thy mouth <WH6310>, thou art taken <WH3920> <WH8738> with the words <WH561> of thy mouth <WH6310>.

Do <WH6213> <WH8798> this now <WH645>, my son <WH1121>, and deliver <WH5337> <WH8734> thyself, when thou art come <WH935> <WH8804> into the hand <WH3709> of thy friend <WH7453>; go <WH3212> <WH8798>, humble <WH7511> <WH8690> thyself, and make sure <WH7292> <WH8798> thy friend <WH7453>.
Give <WH5414> <WH8799> not sleep <WH8142> to thine eyes <WH5869>, nor slumber <WH8572> to thine eyelids <WH6079>.
Deliver <WH5337> <WH8734> thyself as a roe <WH6643> from the hand <WH3027> of the hunter, and as a bird <WH6833> from the hand <WH3027> of the fowler <WH3353>.
Go <WH3212> <WH8798> to the ant <WH5244>, thou sluggard <WH6102>; consider <WH7200> <WH8798> her ways <WH1870>, and be wise <WH2449> <WH8798>:
Which having no guide <WH7101>, overseer <WH7860> <WH8802>, or ruler <WH4910> <WH8802>,
Provideth <WH3559> <WH8686> her meat <WH3899> in the summer <WH7019>, and gathereth <WH103> <WH8804> her food <WH3978> in the harvest <WH7105>.
How long wilt thou sleep <WH7901> <WH8799>, O sluggard <WH6102>? when wilt thou arise <WH6965> <WH8799> out of thy sleep <WH8142> ?
Yet a little <WH4592> sleep <WH8142>, a little <WH4592> slumber <WH8572>, a little <WH4592> folding <WH2264> of the hands <WH3027> to sleep <WH7901> <WH8800>:
So shall thy poverty <WH7389> come <WH935> <WH8804> as one that travelleth <WH1980> <WH8764>, and thy want <WH4270> as an armed <WH4043> man <WH376>.
A naughty <WH1100> person <WH120>, a wicked <WH205> man <WH376>, walketh <WH1980> <WH8802> with a froward <WH6143> mouth <WH6310>.
He winketh <WH7169> <WH8802> with his eyes <WH5869>, he speaketh <WH4448> <WH8802> with his feet <WH7272>, he teacheth <WH3384> <WH8688> with his fingers <WH676>;
Frowardness <WH8419> is in his heart <WH3820>, he deviseht <WH2790> <WH8802> mischief <WH7451> continually <WH6256>; he soweth <WH7971> <WH8762> discord <WH4066> <WH8675> <WH4090>.
Therefore shall his calamity <WH343> come <WH935> <WH8799> suddenly <WH6597>; suddenly <WH6621> shall he be broken <WH7665> <WH8735> without remedy <WH4832>.
These six <WH8337> things doth the YY <WH3068> hate <WH8130> <WH8804>: yea, seven <WH7651> are an abomination <WH8441> unto him <WH5315>:
A proud <WH7311> <WH8802> look <WH5869>, a lying <WH8267> tongue <WH3956>, and hands <WH3027> that shed <WH8210> <WH8802> innocent <WH5355> blood <WH1818>,
An heart <WH3820> that deviseht <WH2790> <WH8802> wicked <WH205> imaginations <WH4284>, feet <WH7272> that be swift <WH4116> <WH8764> in running <WH7323> <WH8800> to mischief <WH7451>,
A false <WH8267> witness <WH5707> that speaketh <WH6315> <WH8686> lies <WH3577>, and he that soweth <WH7971> <WH8764> discord <WH4090> among brethren <WH251>.
My son <WH1121>, keep <WH5341> <WH8798> thy father's <WH1> Mitzvah <WH4687>, and forsake <WH5203> <WH8799> not the Torah <WH8451> of thy mother <WH517>:
Bind <WH7194> <WH8798> them continually <WH8548> upon thine heart <WH3820>, and tie <WH6029> <WH8798> them about thy neck <WH1621>.

When thou goest <WH1980> <WH8692>, it shall lead <WH5148> <WH8686> thee; when thou sleepest <WH7901> <WH8800>, it shall keep <WH8104> <WH8799> thee; and when thou awakest <WH6974> <WH8689>, it shall talk <WH7878> <WH8799> with thee.
For the Mitzvah <WH4687> is a Menorah <WH5216>; and the Torah <WH8451> is light <WH216>; and reproofs <WH8433> of instruction <WH4148> are the way <WH1870> of life <WH2416>:
To keep <WH8104> <WH8800> thee from the evil <WH7451> woman <WH802>, from the flattery <WH2513> of the tongue <WH3956> of a strange woman <WH5237>.
Lust <WH2530> <WH8799> not after her beauty <WH3308> in thine heart <WH3824>; neither let her take <WH3947> <WH8799> thee with her eyelids <WH6079>.

For by means of <WH1157> a whorish <WH2181> <WH8802> woman <WH802> a man is brought to a piece <WH3603> of bread <WH3899>: and the adulteress <WH802> <WH376> will hunt <WH6679> <WH8799> for the precious <WH3368> life <WH5315>.
Can a man <WH376> take <WH2846> <WH8799> fire <WH784> in his bosom <WH2436>, and his clothes <WH899> not be burned <WH8313> <WH8735> ?
Can one <WH376> go <WH1980> <WH8762> upon hot coals <WH1513>, and his feet <WH7272> not be burned <WH3554> <WH8735> ?
So he that goeth in <WH935> <WH8802> to his neighbour's <WH7453> wife <WH802>; whosoever toucheth <WH5060> <WH8802> her shall not be innocent <WH5352> <WH8735>.
Men do not despise <WH936> <WH8799> a thief <WH1590>, if he steal <WH1589> <WH8799> to satisfy <WH4390> <WH8763> his soul <WH5315> when he is hungry <WH7456> <WH8799>;
But if he be found <WH4672> <WH8738>, he shall restore <WH7999> <WH8762> sevenfold <WH7659>; he shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> all the substance <WH1952> of his house <WH1004>.
But whoso committeth adultery <WH5003> <WH8802> with a woman <WH802> lacketh <WH2638> understanding <WH3820>: he that doeth <WH6213> <WH8799> it destroyeth <WH7843> <WH8688> his own soul <WH5315>.
A wound <WH5061> and dishonour <WH7036> shall he get <WH4672> <WH8799>; and his reproach <WH2781> shall not be wiped away <WH4229> <WH8735>.
For jealousy <WH7068> is the rage <WH2534> of a man <WH1397>: therefore he will not spare <WH2550> <WH8799> in the day <WH3117> of vengeance <WH5359>.
He will not regard <WH5375> <WH8799> <WH6440> any ransom <WH3724>; neither will he rest content <WH14> <WH8799>, though thou givest many <WH7235> <WH8686> gifts <WH7810>.
